species.name: quagsire
descriptions: A dim-witted Pokémon. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head into boats or rocks while swimming.
A QUAGSIRE hunts by leaving its mouth wide open in water and waiting for its prey to blunder in. Because it doesn’t move, it does not get very hungry.
Due to its relaxed and carefree attitude, it often bumps its head on boulders and boat hulls as it swims.
It has an easygoing nature. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head on boats and boulders while swimming.
It has a sluggish nature. It lies at the river’s bottom, waiting for prey to stray into its mouth.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

abilities.name: water-absorb
abilities.effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: unaware
abilities.effect: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.
